messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Spacepizza Division

Cargo: It looks like a neighbouring station accidentally delivered their pizza to you instead

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Engineering Foyer.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: I will operate the HoP desk for a few minutes if anyone wants extra access

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Earth Planet-Cracker Fourteen, please stand-by.
